channel.title: Friends
channel.description: when someone tries to add a friend. it laggs them and locks their account. locks as in they have to close the window and the next time they try to log on my server it gives them a black screen and they have to close the window again, then [b]I[/b] have to go in and delete the friend. please help!

item.title: Friends
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

You’re never screwed because of errors. You can always edit things to make it work. You just need to know what you did wrong, probably something you added and it went wrong. Try removing some of your latest updates.
